post:
Hi,

I have an unused Xeon & SSD server and would like to provide LET users with a Free VPS.  This is the third time I've given away virtual servers here on LET.  The first two times the VPS servers were online for more than 6 months.

**Please do not fill the Firstname and Lastname fields with gibberish or your VPS will be deleted.**

Instant VPS creation:
https://cp.virtualvm.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=2

Cheers!
-VVM
